content.text: good! just got back from visiting family in new hampshire.
nice! i've never been to new hampshire.
it's a beautiful state! what are you up to today?
i'm getting ready to move to a new city to pursue my dreams.
that's exciting! what are your dreams?
i'm a lead singer and my spouse is my manager. we're moving to LA to make it big!
wow! that's awesome! i hope you make it!
thanks! i appreciate it. what do you do for fun?
i like to cook and bake. i also love taking photos.
that's really cool! i love to cook too. i'm not very social, but i love cooking for my family and friends.
i love cooking for my family and friends too. it's so much fun to share my love of food with them.
exactly! and it's a great way to relax and be creative.
i totally agree! i'm glad we have something in common.
me too! it's nice to meet you.
you too! i hope you have a great time in your new city!
